metadata:field:convert.description: Converts custom-field-xml-files to a file used to create or update the metadata.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: directory where source files you convert are stored

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: output directory where metadata are saved

sourcedir.description: directory where source files you convert are stored

outputdir.description: output directory where metadata are saved

metadata:field:generate.description: Generates custom field metadata converting values in any sort of spreadsheets, e.g., csv and excel to xml files.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

input.name: input
input.description: input file to be converted to xml files

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: output directory where metadata are saved

updates.name: updates
updates.description: whether update existing xml files in outputdir or not

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.description: delimiter for the input file. the default value is comma

picklistdelimiter.name: picklistdelimiter
picklistdelimiter.description: delimiter for picklist fullNames and labels. the default value is semicolon

input.description: input file to be converted to xml files

outputdir.description: output directory where metadata are saved

updates.description: whether update existing xml files in outputdir or not

delimiter.description: delimiter for the input file. the default value is comma

picklistdelimiter.description: delimiter for picklist fullNames and labels. the default value is semicolon

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: directory where a template csv file is saved.
directory where a template csv file is saved.
